EmailTemplate.name: 10-04-22 DBNK Accelerate Magazine V2 Issue 3 Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: What’s your payments strategy?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Are you challenged to keep up with the changing payments landscape? You’re not alone. In the latest issue of NCR’s Accelerate <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/accelerate-magazine-v2-issue3?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_September_AccelerateMagV2-Issue3_DigitalBanking&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> magazine, Doug Brown, president & GM of NCR Digital Banking, and Karen Webster, CEO of PYMNTS, examine the strategic relevance of payments and discuss how to survive in a highly competitive and complex landscape. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
